TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit Sha256 extends System.Object
public ref class Sha256 abstract sealed

Docs.summary:
This class provides access to the Arm64 SHA256 Crypto intrinsics
Arm64 CPU indicate support for this feature by setting ID_AA64ISAR0_EL1.SHA2 is 1 or better
